website_summaries.verdict: Antiqued finish with bronze pulls creates an instant heirloom.
pros: At 72 inches, this extra-long, heavy piece offers plenty of shelf space
cons: Drawer pulls are an uncommon size so not easily replaced

customer_reviews.title: Old world quality
customer_reviews.text: This high quality product was the perfect solution to filling a large empty area in the area where the entrance hallway meets the dining area. The design is brilliant. It looks hand made. I am pretty sure it is made here in the US. I’m thinking it was probably designed by a master carpenter/cabinet builder. They designed it so that when you assemble it, it will fit together tightly with mostly machine screws that go into threaded openings. It requires only a screwdriver and an Allen wrench. Highly recommended. Just make sure the long narrow dimensions are right for your purposes. 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: kwadzana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about buying this because there are so many reviews about it being damaged, or coming with incorrect pieces, but I'm glad I ordered it. Mine didn't have any issues and it was fairly easy to assemble. It's very sturdy and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions need work, nice console
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's as sturdy and attractive as can be expected at this price range. The assembly instructions aren't great though. Don't fully tighten the legs before putting the shelves in place. PS: I changed the drawer pulls to these: Richelieu Hardware BP80237142 Classic Metal Pull ,3 7/9", Pewter (on Amazon, require drilling new holes).
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite pieces
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought this as a sofa table but it was a little too tall. It fit perfectly in our entry area though and has quickly become one of my favorite pieces of furniture. I love having the drawers and extra shelving and the color is perfection. It’s wonderful quality and we have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for entry way.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table at $152, it’s now being advertised twice that price, which I would not pay. For $152 this console table is perfect. Luckily mine came undamaged, packaging had a lot of protection, corners and hard cardboard. Very heavy packaging. It’s long, cream colored and has a slight antique look to it, faux damage/burn marks and brass handles. Overall, I love it and still trying to figure out how to decorate it.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, yet disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this table. I planned to purchase two; I only bought one to make sure it was going to fit in my family room/wall. I like the table, it’s pretty sturdy. Unfortunately two of the drawers are cracked. I Will call the manufacturer to see if they can replace the drawers — I’d hate to take it apart to ship it back! Total inconvenience if that is final solution!
customer_reviews.author: Tmp11

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece! So affordable and it just looks like a quality, solid piece of furniture. I assembled it with no trouble. I was a little worried after reading a few reviews that said their piece came damaged. My order arrived very fast and was in perfect condition. I have been shopping around for the past year for a long and narrow console and was so happy I finally found one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauralei

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: We received the console table today and the package arrived so damaged that some of the hardware was missing and the front of the table has visible damage in two locations, as well as structural damage at the joints where the legs are attached to the top drawer unit. We are unsure how to return the item as the box is so damaged that we cannot possibly use it. Please advise on what options we have to receive a credit on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I really do love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would've given this 5 overall stars, but I had to send first one back because it was broken, BUT, the replacement was shipped immediately, I recieved it the day after I shipped first one back! This is a beautiful, sturdy piece! Perfect size for my entryway!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality a little poor
customer_reviews.text: disappointed in the finish.....supposedly was a crackle finish but only has two little spots on top....we needed this or we would have sent it back....one drawer wasn't put in right so we had to fix it....don't think I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: vickiro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great console table! Good quality for the price. It is very sturdy and heavy and made out of good material. I was only missing 2 of the L brackets but you can pick those up at the hardware store. I highly recommend this product. The only con I can think of would be the color choices. I wish they had it in a dark espresso or black, it would match my decor a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Long Entry Table
customer_reviews.text: I love this entry table and I got many compliments on it. It did come with some dinged corners, but you can't really tell. It was too hard to put together. My favorite this about it is how big it is length and height. It's hard to find a good size entry table. And it's made with good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but odd crackle spots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. It was not too difficult to put together. There is some random “crackle” spots that are odd. Probably would give 5 stats if those spots were not there. Shipping was also delayed several days.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Giver

customer_reviews.title: Love everything
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table! I was nervous to receive it after seeing so many complain it cams damaged... mine was not damaged at all. It came very well packaged and all pieces worked just fine. Super easy to put together . The fact that all drawers are already together makes it ridiculously easy. It is super heavy though so be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hill

customer_reviews.title: the paint is bad (splotchy) and the joints aren't very well put together
customer_reviews.text: The console is not well made, under the drawer component it appears scrap pieces were used, the paint is bad (splotchy) and the joints aren't very well put together. The drawer pulls are screwed in from the front! I think this unit should sell for much less, however, that being said, it is sturdy when u get it together and it is just the right thing for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: kathy w.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality and sturdiness than expected! Pretty, heavy, functional very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: usually comes with damage
customer_reviews.text: first one was really damaged bad. 2nd one was ok but it is a very cheaply made product
customer_reviews.author: joe a.

customer_reviews.title: Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the handles & unable to replace them due to their uncommon size. Also draw on right sits crooked & is unable to be straightened out as drawers cannoy be pulled out & adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: JA - MA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality piece
customer_reviews.text: VERY heavy box. Best to have help to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and was super easy to put together. Looks amazing. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Zuzu & Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the process. this was a fair deal. It's sturdy, good size. I'm quite pleased with it. Easy to assemble. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vsailaway

customer_reviews.title: Love this console table
customer_reviews.text: Love this console table. Long length we needed and fits perfectly in our space. Managed to assemble without the result of divorce, so would rate assembly fairly easy! Shopped prices for this and Amazon Best Buy by far.
customer_reviews.author: Walter F.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Console table, looks great, lots of compliments on color & style
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sturdy buffet table to match my dining room set. I compared quality and pricing to many other websites for this style table. It’s exactly the length and width I needed. Highly recommend, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, easy to assemble , high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bruneio

customer_reviews.title: Came smashed, rejected it.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the other reviews, I took a gamble, but mine came smashed up like the rest. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very heavy and sturdy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good description of item
customer_reviews.text: Buffet table for dining room. It is what the picture and description describe
customer_reviews.author: TMart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this! I put it together myself in about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive damaged. Is very large and sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lily walker

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged nicely. It's exactly what I needed for my long skinny foyer. Easy to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit behind a sofa
customer_reviews.text: It's the only one that I could find that fits the width of a sofa
customer_reviews.author: Y.L. Yin

customer_reviews.title: Nice  console, but some mistakes in the assembling instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice console. It is easy to assemble, however there are 2 errors in the instructions. I have communicated the seller to improve the instructions, but if you have some practice assembling furniture, you will not find any major hurdle to mount it.
customer_reviews.author: JGGJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy One!
customer_reviews.text: I had looked everywhere for the perfect hall table. Then I found this and it seemed too good to be true - just the right size and great price. I was not disappointed. Easier then expected assembly, easy to adjust feet on legs to level it up and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Honnalora Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. This table is beautiful and sturdy heavier then excepted but easy to put together. It’s great quality for the price. I was a little nervous at first due to some of the reviews. But I love this piece I attached a picture of it not fully decorated and it’s still looks awesome. I accidentally put the handles on wrong (so don’t mind that) I have to put the on correctly. Overall I am soo happy with this look. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nad

product_meta.title: Powell Furniture Crackle Console, Cream
product_meta.description: Highlight any space with a Farmhouse style extended Console Table for a light, airy look. Features an antique Cream crackle finish, cast antique bronze drawer pulls, and generous shelf space for display or storage. Simple charm won't overshadow your precious items.
feature_bullets: Antique finish and cast antique bronze drawer pulls
Miff With Birch Veneer; Solid Wood

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars53 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
